mapper.select: SELECT college.id as id, college.logo as logo, college.rank as rank, college.local_rank as localRank FROM college,major WHERE major.id=#{majorId} AND college.id=major.college_id

SELECT id as id, name as name, code as code, logo as logo, is_211 as is211, is_985 as is985, is_34 as is34, city_id as cityId, rank as rank, local_rank as localRank, follow_num as followNum FROM college WHERE rank IN (#{curRank}-4, #{curRank}-3, #{curRank}-2, #{curRank}-1, #{curRank}, #{curRank}+1, #{curRank}+2, #{curRank}+3, #{curRank}+4) AND id NOT IN (#{collegeId}) ORDER BY rank

SELECT college.id as id, college.name as name, logo as logo, is_211 as is211, is_985 as is985, is_34 as is34, rank as rank, local_rank as localRank, city.name as city FROM college JOIN city ON college.city_id = city.id WHERE college.name like #{condition}
SELECT distinct school FROM college join major on major.college_id = college.id WHERE college.id = #{id}
SELECT major.id as id, major.name as name FROM college join major on major.college_id = college.id WHERE college.id=#{collegeId} and school =#{school}
SELECT logo as logo, college.name as college, is_211 as is211, is_985 as is985, is_34 as is34, city.name as city FROM college join city on college.city_id = city.id WHERE college.id = #{collegeId};
